protocol.name: P-GSE37255-2
protocol.text: For infection, 10-day-old plants were spray-inoculated to saturation with a spore suspension of 40,000 spores/ml (strain Emwa1)

protocol.name: P-GSE37255-3
protocol.text: Seeds from A. thaliana ecotype Wassilewskija (WS) were sown on a soil/sand mixture, stratified for 3 days at 4 °C, and then grown under a 12 h photoperiod in a growth chamber at 20 °C.

protocol.name: P-GSE37255-4
protocol.text: In two independent experiments, cotyledons from the ecotype Wassilewskija (Ws-4) wild-type or pskr1-5 mutant plants were treated with water, or inoculated with H. arabidopsidis to establish a compatible interaction. Total RNA was extracted from about 100 mg of these tissues according to a procedure described (Laroche-Raynal et al., Plant Science Letters 35, 139-146,1984).

protocol.name: P-GSE37255-8
protocol.text: Background adjustment, quantile normalization, and summarization of raw data were performed with the Affymetrix Power Tools APT1.14.4 software package.
